title: Neighborhood Integration and Local Resource Access During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a person in temporary housing navigating crisis I want to build neighborhood connections and access local resources So that I can create stability and support in my current location regardless of housing permanence
content:
Feature: Neighborhood Integration and Local Resource Access During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a person in temporary housing navigating crisis
  I want to build neighborhood connections and access local resources
  So that I can create stability and support in my current location regardless of housing permanence

  Background:
    Given I am living in transitional housing or temporary location
    And I am learning a new neighborhood while in crisis
    And I need local resources and community connections
    And I am using the Value Scanner to navigate neighborhood integration

  Scenario: Learning essential neighborhood resources while in crisis
    Given I have just moved to this neighborhood in crisis circumstances
    And I need to quickly learn where essential services are located
    When I explore my new neighborhood
    Then the Value Scanner maps critical local resources
    And identifies nearest food assistance, medical care, schools, childcare
    And surfaces public transportation routes and walkability
    And locates free/low-cost resources for children (parks, libraries, activities)
    And provides information about neighborhood safety and character
    And my personal_agent creates personalized neighborhood resource guide
    And updates information as I discover new resources
    And helps me build neighborhood knowledge efficiently

  Scenario: Accessing neighborhood food assistance with dignity
    Given I need supplemental food support beyond my grocery budget
    And neighborhood has food pantries, community meals, or assistance programs
    When I seek food assistance in my neighborhood
    Then the Value Scanner helps me locate and access food resources
    And provides information about pantry hours, requirements, and culture
    And prepares me for what to expect to reduce anxiety
    And frames food assistance as community care economy, not charity
    And tracks my care contributions that create standing for support
    And my personal_agent helps me navigate first visits
    And recognizes accessing help as strength, not failure
    And connects me to most dignity-preserving food resources

  Scenario: Building relationships with neighbors despite stigma about circumstances
    Given I am living in transitional housing or housing that's visibly "for" vulnerable people
    And I worry about neighborhood stigma and judgment
    When I interact with neighbors
    Then the Value Scanner helps me navigate neighborhood relationships
    And provides strategies for building connections authentically
    And validates that I am valuable neighbor regardless of circumstances
    And helps me decide what to disclose about my situation
    And supports me in resisting internalized shame
    And my personal_agent coaches me through neighbor interactions
    And recognizes that building community while vulnerable takes courage
    And celebrates positive neighbor connections

  Scenario: Participating in neighborhood mutual aid and care economy
    Given my neighborhood has informal mutual aid networks
    And I can contribute even while receiving support
    When I engage with neighborhood care economy
    Then the Value Scanner connects me to local mutual aid networks
    And makes visible my contributions (childcare exchanges, skill sharing, information sharing)
    And facilitates reciprocal care relationships in neighborhood
    And tracks my care economy participation with care tokens
    And validates that I have valuable contributions despite crisis
    And my personal_agent identifies opportunities to contribute
    And recognizes mutual aid participation as community-building work
    And supports reciprocal relationships, not one-way charity

  Scenario: Navigating neighborhood safety concerns as vulnerable person
    Given I have heightened safety concerns due to domestic violence
    And I am learning a new neighborhood's safety landscape
    When I assess and navigate neighborhood safety
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify safe routes and spaces
    And surfaces information about neighborhood safety patterns
    And connects me to neighbors who can provide safety support
    And helps me teach children neighborhood safety practices
    And tracks safety concerns and incidents
    And my personal_agent alerts me to potential safety issues
    And recognizes safety navigation as constant cognitive labor
    And validates that my vigilance is appropriate

  Scenario: Accessing neighborhood services while managing transportation barriers
    Given I don't have reliable transportation
    And many neighborhood resources require travel
    When I need to access services across the neighborhood
    Then the Value Scanner optimizes my travel for efficiency
    And identifies services accessible by walking or public transit
    And helps me batch errands to minimize trips
    And surfaces transportation assistance programs
    And coordinates with neighbors for ride-sharing when appropriate
    And my personal_agent plans routes considering my constraints
    And recognizes transportation navigation as significant invisible labor
    And validates that lack of transportation makes everything harder

  Scenario: Building neighborhood connections that might endure beyond crisis
    Given I might move to permanent housing in this neighborhood or elsewhere
    And relationships I build now could become long-term community
    When I invest in neighborhood relationships
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify connections worth developing
    And supports authentic relationship-building despite uncertainty
    And validates that building community is valuable regardless of housing permanence
    And helps me maintain connections if I move within neighborhood
    And facilitates staying connected if I move to different neighborhood
    And my personal_agent tracks meaningful neighborhood relationships
    And recognizes community-building as important social infrastructure work
    And celebrates relationships that provide support and belonging

  Scenario: Accessing neighborhood resources for children's enrichment and development
    Given my children need activities, socialization, and development opportunities
    And money for activities is nonexistent
    When I seek enrichment opportunities for children in neighborhood
    Then the Value Scanner identifies free/low-cost neighborhood resources
    And surfaces library programs, parks, recreation centers, free community events
    And helps me access scholarship programs for children's activities
    And connects me to neighbors who organize children's activities
    And coordinates neighborhood childcare exchanges
    And my personal_agent tracks children's interests and matches to opportunities
    And recognizes resource navigation as substantial parenting labor
    And validates that I am providing rich childhood on no money

  Scenario: Managing neighborhood privacy while building community connections
    Given I need privacy about my location and circumstances for safety
    And I also need genuine community connections
    When I balance privacy protection with community participation
    Then the Value Scanner helps me maintain appropriate boundaries
    And guides what's safe to disclose in neighborhood context
    And validates that selective disclosure is appropriate
    And helps me build authentic connections without oversharing
    And tracks who knows what about my situation
    And my personal_agent alerts me to privacy risks
    And recognizes boundary management as constant cognitive work
    And supports both safety and genuine belonging

  Scenario: Participating in neighborhood decision-making and collective action
    Given my neighborhood faces issues that affect residents
    And I have stake in neighborhood decisions despite housing temporariness
    When neighborhood collective action or decision-making occurs
    Then the Value Scanner connects me to neighborhood organizing
    And validates my right to participate in neighborhood governance
    And helps me contribute despite time and energy constraints
    And facilitates my voice in decisions affecting my household
    And tracks neighborhood issues and actions
    And my personal_agent surfaces opportunities matching my capacity
    And recognizes community organizing as valuable civic labor
    And supports my participation as full neighborhood member

  Scenario: Accessing informal neighborhood support during acute crisis
    Given I am experiencing acute crisis (no food, utility shutoff, safety emergency)
    And I need immediate neighborhood-level support
    When crisis requires rapid local response
    Then the Value Scanner connects me to immediate neighborhood resources
    And identifies neighbors who've offered emergency support
    And facilitates rapid requests for help through care economy network
    And helps me access emergency assistance without shame
    And validates that asking for crisis help is appropriate
    And my personal_agent surfaces most appropriate immediate resources
    And recognizes that everyone experiences crises requiring community support
    And ensures rapid connection to neighborhood mutual aid

  Scenario: Contributing neighborhood knowledge and resources to care economy network
    Given I am learning valuable information about neighborhood resources
    And other vulnerable people could benefit from my knowledge
    When I discover useful neighborhood information or resources
    Then the Value Scanner enables me to share neighborhood knowledge
    And credits my information contributions to care economy
    And helps other vulnerable people in neighborhood access resources
    And recognizes my neighborhood expertise as valuable contribution
    And validates that I have important knowledge despite being new
    And my personal_agent prompts me to share useful discoveries
    And tracks my information sharing as care economy participation
    And celebrates my contribution to community resource knowledge
